concept.title: Use Other Selection Options
concept.shortdesc: Typing SELECT and entering? displays all selection options, fromwhich, you can choose a proper one. Remove Selection from Multiple Objects

conbody.p: Under the prompt of Select objects, you can type R and choose a selection to remove objects from the selection set. You also can enter A to add objects to the selection set.
Holding down SHIFT and selecting objects again, the selected objects would be removed from the selection set.
